directions: Blend all ingredients in food processor. Pour over pork, marinade overnight.

Dump pork and marinade into oven safe pot uncovered. If needed, add a little water so the liquid goes about 1/4 up the side of the pork. Bake at 275 for about 7 hours until browned on the outside and falling apart. Shred with forks or hands.
ingredients: 5 Pound Pork Shoulder (Boston Butt), Bone In.
title: Slow-Roasted Shredded Pork
